I had best mention that I am running in Simplified Chinese with GB 18030 as my 
default encoding.

Could this be related to the work you did with converting repository provider
mappings from natures to session properties?
I don't think so.  That's been in a long time with no problems.

Tod, have you seen this again?

The exception makes no sense to us.  Did you have another provider loaded 
(e.g. the pessimistic provider example?)

I have only ever seen it the once (actually I didn't see it - just saw it in 
the log). It is quite likely that I was in one of two conditions

1) Simplified Chinese locale
2) org.eclipse.ui.actioncontribution tests was loaded from ottcvs1/desktop

I saw this in my log today using build I20030304 1402
I don't have any other providers installed (except possibly the binary project
provider)
